pepc-e/scramble_v.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                SCRAMBLE_V
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up physical system: particle positions, velocities
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine scramble_v(i1,n)
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use utils
00013   implicit none
00014 
00015  integer :: dum1, dum2, dum3  
00016 real :: uxt, uyt, uzt
00017   integer :: i, j, k, kk, p, i1, n, n1
00018 
00019   dum1 = -71 - 10*my_rank
00020   dum2 = -113301 - 10*my_rank
00021   dum3 = -8651 - 10*my_rank
00022   !  exclude odd one out
00023   if (mod(n,2).ne.0) then
00024      n1=n-1
00025   else
00026     n1 = n
00027   endif
00028  write(15,*) 'scrambling ',n1,' particles'
00029   !  scramble indices to remove correlation between ux,uy,uz
00030   do i=1,n1
00031      p=i+i1-1
00032      j=n1*rano(dum1)+i1
00033      k=n1*rano(dum2)+i1
00034      kk=n1*rano(dum3)+i1
00035      uxt=ux(p)
00036      uyt=uy(p)
00037      uzt=uz(p)
00038      ux(p)=ux(kk)
00039      uy(p)=uy(j)
00040      uz(p)=uz(k)
00041      ux(kk)=uxt
00042      uy(j)=uyt
00043      uz(k)=uzt
00044   end do
00045 
00046 end subroutine scramble_v
